channel.title: CVE Feed for WPBackItUp -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-43269|2024-08-27T15:02:34.951Z -- wpbackitup -- backup%20and%20restore%20wordpress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPBackItUp Backup and Restore WordPress.This issue affects Backup and Restore WordPress: from n/a through 1.50.
